blogPost.excerpt: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.body: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.title: OnlySheets - Sell access to any Google Sheet
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 出售访问google表，而不与整个INTERNET共享。通过Gumroad轻松设置。使用gumroad ping，这个表的脚本捕获所有的销售和匹配销售与你分配的表在。然后给浏览者访问买家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的访问权限

localize.description: 出售訪問google表，而不與整個INTERNET共享。通過Gumroad輕鬆設置。使用gumroad ping，這個表的腳本捕獲所有的銷售和匹配銷售與你分配的表在。然後給瀏覽者訪問買家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的訪問權限

previous.excerpt: Stop slacking, start rocking. ⠀ 🏖️ Purpose-built for remote work 🤘 Messaging, tasks, notes & files in one space 🤝 Work with clients, freelancers & partners from the same space 🚘 Integrates with Google Drive and Zoom 🛣️ Available on Web, iOS and Android
previous.title: Rock - Multi-modal collaboration tool for distributed teams

localize.description: 停止懈怠，开始摇摆。⠀ 🏖️ 专为远程工作而设计 🤘 消息、任务、笔记和文件在同一空间内 🤝 与客户、自由职业者和合作伙伴在同一空间内工作 🚘 与 Google Drive 和 Zoom 集成 🛣️ 在 Web、iOS 和 Android 上可用。
